$comment: description of a type of files inside a domain.

description.name: string
description.$comment: a short name describing what this file type stands for.

suffix.$comment: the dot-starting suffix of this type of files, or an empty string, if they do not have any.

mimetype.$comment: a string representing the MIME type of the content (see e.g.: [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Basics_of_HTTP/MIME_types]). In probable cases where no valid MIME type exists, you can 'define' a human-readable type, e.g. application/matlab, or application/igor, although it is not considered strictly as a MIME type.

channels.$comment: a section describing what channels of signals are recorded in this domain.
